one.name: Tramore Lifeboat Station
one.description: Boats: 'Tra Mhor' and 'Isabella Purchase'. During its 110-year history the crews have been honoured with 18 awards for gallantry.

two.name: Dunmore East Lifeboat Station
two.description: Trent class AWL 'Elizabeth and Ronald'. The crew have been awarded sixteen medals, eight Silver and eight Bronze, the last being voted in 1976

three.name: Baltimore Lifeboat Station
three.description: AWL 'Alan Massey' and inshore lifeboat 'Alice and Charles'

four.name: Castletownbere lifeboat station
four.description: AWL 'Annette Hutton', class Trent. New pontoon opened in 2013

five.name: Clifden Lifeboat Station
five.description: Inshore Atlantic 85 class as well as the newest addition to the fleet a Shannon class lifeboat now operate from Clifden

six.name: Sligo Bay Lifeboat Station
six.description: 'Sheila and Dennis Tongue' B class inshore lifeboat operates in Sligo Bay
